lines.romaji: Sou ka~ iya uun watashi wa ne Fuku-chan ni youji ga atta tte iu yori ka wa Rena-chan ni chotto renraku shitakutte Fuku-chan nara shitteru kana to omotta no.
Jaa shÅto mÄ“ru de okutte moratte ii?
Mazu Rena-chan no renrakusaki o shitteru ka kiku beki datta
Baka na furi de wa naku hontou ni baka datta
Eto, Asami desu, Kondou Asami desu.
Nee, purofiiru-chou yatta yo ne~ sou sou sou.
Nanka, Rena-chan, touji Ishizaki-kun no kotoâ€¦
Ikinari gohan ni sasou no wa hen na node toriaezu mukashibanashi o shite moriagaru
Chinamini sa, Rena-chan, shigatsu tsuitachi tte doushiteru?
Sokkaâ€¦ un, zenzen yakusoku aru nara shouganai yo.
Sono yakusoku ga toujitsu ni kyuu kyo naku natte hitori de Yumean ni iku koto ni naru tte koto ka
(Asami) Atarashii gengou no happyou ni Nihonjuu ga chuumoku suru shigatsu tsuitachi
Watashi wa futatabi jimoto ni kaeri Rena-chan ga otozureru Yumean ni mukatta
(Asami) Tada itsu kuru ka wakaranai node nen no tame gozenchuu kara harikomi
Kono seki nara minogasu koto wa nai
(Iya-hon, fukusuu no kamera no shattÄ on)
Chouki-sen ni sonaete sutamina o tsukete oku
Ikinari konna gattsuri-kei de onaka ippai ni nattara chouki-sen ni natta baai dorinku-baa dake de nagai suru koto ni naru
(Tenin) Shitsurei shimasu, kochira osage shite mo yoroshii deshou ka.
Sudeni kanari yukkuri sasete moratte iru
Kyuu ni yakusoku nakunacchatte sa shikatanai kara hitori de gohan tabeyou to omotte
A-chin ni renraku shiyou ka to omottan da kedo mou yakusoku irechatte ru yo na tte omotte
Demo aeta kara yokatta  Nee, sugoi guuzen
Nee, sekkaku dakara sa betsu no omise ikanai?
Miyaoka-san ga kitemo, otagai kizukanai you ni suru shika nai
Kyou wa watashi ogoru kara suki na no tanonde
E~? Ii yo  Iya iya ii yo ii yo
Ii no?  Un! Mochiron suki na no tanonde
Ogotte kureru no wa arigatai no dakedo watashi wa kore izen ni 'Yumean gozen' to 'Shine Muscat' to 'Chokoreto Parfait' to 'Hourensou no ohitashi' o tabete iru
Aa, Rena-chan sa watashi, jitsu wa sa kyou ohiru kara koko ni iru no ne
Sou nano yo, jitsu wa ne
De sa, hiruma ni sa kekkou tabechatte
Dakara moshi kore o harau tte naru to soutou no gaku icchau kara zenzen ogoranakute daijoubu da wa
Ii yo ii yo, daijoubu daijoubu
Daijoubu, senshuu kyuuryou haitta shi, ogorasete

lines.romaji: E~ nanika, gomen, warui ne  Aa, zenzen, zenzen
Teka, nande kyou hiru kara koko ni iru no?
Aa, sou souâ€¦ nanika ne, sou nan da yo ne
Shigoto no meeru toka kaeshitetara konna jikan ni nacchatta wa

Onaka wa nandakanda de suite iru
Au no tte itsu buri dakke?
Rena-chan, seijinshiki kite nai yo ne?
Ahaha, ee~ jaa mou 14 nen buri toka?
Watashi, Nacchi to Miipon to kaette kitara zettai gohan itteru
E~ ii na, kondo watashi mo sasotte
Watashi wa ne, Shi-chan fusai to wa nankai ka issho ni gohan tabeta yo

Maa, aidoru-teki na urikata ja nai kara jikan kakaru kamo shirenai kedo, itsuka zettai ureru to omou n da yo ne
Rena-chan, Fuku-chan wa zettai urenai shi mou sugu yameru yo

A-chin, are kakawatteta n da, sugo~i

Ah, sou da nee, chotto kore mite

lines.romaji: Hobo Maakyurii gokko datta kedo ne  Sou dakke?
Ahaha, tashika ni ninki datta mon ne
Ato sukoshi! Sono kobachi wo tabe owareba...
Un, ima ne Kumagai Aakitekuto de hataraiteru yo
Mou ne, 24  Aa~ mou sonna nan da
Sonna koto yori hayaku kobachi wo!
Nanika sa, Haruka-chan tte watashi no naka de...
Nanika mita koto aru na to omottara...
Mae no baito saki de issho datta yakuzai-shi no Miyaoka-san

lines.romaji: Watashi wa ne, ashita no hiru ni Toukyou kaette, yuugata kara uchiawase  Sou nan da, taihen da ne
Demo are desho, Rena-chan mo ashita hayai n desho?
Mata sa kocchi modottekita ra gohan toka shiyou yo  Un!
Mata renraku suru ne  Un, watashi mo suru
Jaa ne, ki wo tsukete ne  A-chin mo ne
Doushiyouâ€¦ futari wa renrakusaki wo koukan shita kedo kyori ga chikamaru no wa mou sukoshi saki
Tada kono mama da to kakujitsu ni furin kankei ni natte shimau
Yokugasa watashi wa yotei yori mo kanari hayame ni ie wo deta
Suimasen, kinou Muan de Moriyama Rena-chan to issho ni ita Kondou to iu mono desu keredomo  Aa~ doumo
Oshigoto mae ni honto moushiwakenai n desu keredomo chotto dake ojikan ii desu ka?
Suimasen, ano, sonna ni ojikan torasenai n de
Rena-chan to wa dono you na gokankei desu ka?
Iya, mae ni hataraite ta omise de yoku issho ni natte te
Aa, sou nan desu ne, renrakusaki koukan shite mashita yo ne?

lines.romaji: Watashi, Rena-chan to wa hoikuen kara no osananajimi de ano ko mukashi kara sugoku sunao de honto ni ii ko nan desu yo ne
Dakara zettai ni shiawase ni natte hoshii n desu yo
Kanojo ni te dasanai de moraemasu?
Iyaiya, betsu ni te wo dasu toka sonna tsumori nai desu kedo
Aa, sou nan desu ne, dattara ii n desu kedo
Iya, sono mae ni ikinari kite shitsurei janai desu ka?
Suimasen, hitotsu dake, jitsu wa ki ni natta koto ga atte
Miyaoka-san kikonsha desu yo ne?  Eh? Sou desu kedo...
Okusan iru noni daijoubu nan desu ka?
Iyaiya, kanojo wa imouto mitai na kankaku dakara sonna tsumori mattaku nai desu yo
Mou ii desu ka ne? Sorosoro ikanakya ikenai n de
Doushite tochuu de kekkon yubiwa hazushita n desu ka?  Eh?
Omise ni kita toki ni wa kekkon yubiwa tsukete ta noni, dorinku baa de Rena-chan to renrakusaki koukan shite iru toki ni wa hazushite mashita yo ne?
Iya, betsu ni sore wa sonna fukai imi wa
Sou nan desu ne, sou iu tsumori ga nai n dattara betsu ni hazusu hitsuyou nakunai desu ka?
Nanika sou iu kanousei wo kanjichatta kara hazushichatta n ja nai n desu ka?  Iya
Shokuji wo suru toki ni jama datta kara
Jaa, shokuji wo suru toki ni wa maikai itsumo hazusareteru...  Hazushite masu yo!
Mou iikagen ni shite moraemasu ka?
Un, chotto soko dake ki ni chacchatta n de
Honto sonna hen na imi nai n de, mou ii desu ka?

lines.romaji: Ah, hai... shitara mou toriaezu, kongo Rena-chan ni chikazukanai demo moraette mo ii desu ka?
Sono kawari, kongo Rena-chan ga kanashimu you na koto attara watashi zettai yurusanai n de
Kuruma no doa wo shimeru oto
Omise ni hayaku tsuita hi ni wa gojibun de kagi wo oake ni natta hou ga ii to omoimasu yo!
Kakujitsu ni yabai yatsu da to omowareta kedo, are dake ieba daijoubu na hazu
Temee yoku mo watashi no daiji na jikan muda ni shite kureta na, kuso ga!
Ja neeto temee no shokuba totsugeki suru kara na!
Are mou ikkai mite mitakatta ki mo suru kedo
Rena-chan no tame ni wa kore de yokatta shi, kocchi no hou ga kitto toku mo tsumeta hazu
